mapper.select: SELECT categoryId, appId, name, icon, brief FROM app_category LEFT JOIN category ON app_category.categoryId = category.id WHERE app_category.appId = #{id};

SELECT categoryId, appId, name, icon, brief FROM app_category LEFT JOIN category ON app_category.categoryId = category.id WHERE exists(SELECT * FROM (SELECT id FROM apps ORDER BY updateTime DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}) AS c WHERE appId = c.id) ORDER BY appId DESC;

SELECT a.categoryId, a.appId, c.name, c.icon, c.brief FROM app_category AS a LEFT JOIN category AS c ON a.categoryId = c.id WHERE exists(SELECT * FROM (SELECT DISTINCT apps.id FROM apps LEFT JOIN app_category ON apps.id = app_category.appId WHERE app_category.categoryId = #{id} ORDER BY updateTime DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}) AS c WHERE appId = c.id) ORDER BY appId DESC
